import React from 'react' import { InputAdmin } from './Input' import ButtonAdmin from './Button' function PasswordUI({password1, password2, valuePassword1, valuePassword2, handleVerification, value}) { const samePassword= password1 === password2 const validPassword = password1.length > 5 && /\d/.test(password1) && /[A-Z]/.test(password1) && samePassword const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() handleVerification() } return (
handleSubmit(e)}>
valuePassword1(e.target.value)}/> valuePassword2(e.target.value)}/>

Le mot de passe doit contenir plus de 6 characters,un chiffre et une majuscule

) } export default PasswordUI
